entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #61816
  • Perf regression: updates #61815
  • Upgrade guide change - `NavigationException` removal #61811
    10.0-preview5
  • Deduplicate SignalR group messages across connections #61809
  • gRPC Transcoding: SwaggerGen can not handle the enum option allow_alias #61808
  • Known Build Error: ProcessBufferedRenderBatches_WritesRenders fails #61807
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #61806
  • Perf improvement: kestrel-header-symbols #61805
  • Perf improvement: kestrel-encoded-url, mTls-handshakes-kestrel, tls-renegotiation-kestrel #61804
  • Output formatter unexpectedly returns new instance of scoped service #61803
  • OpenApi controller endpoint metadata inheritance inconsistent #61801

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #61788

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed devtools url used for debug with chrome and edge #61813
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • InvalidOperationException when decompressed data exceeds request body size limit #61812
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Deduplicate group messages across connections #61810
    area-signalr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `cd430b4` to `90a4152` #61772
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview5
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #61802
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview5

Updated

  • Swap out Win11 for Win-VS2022 in CI #61743
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix HttpLoggingMiddleware Request/Response bodies logging in case of stream being closed by a subsequent middleware #61490
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Onboard the GitHub Action based Issue-Labeler #61780
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/10.0-preview4] Backport identity template fix. #61795
    area-mvc
  • Update `ResourceCollectionProvider` to take advantage of Declarative persistent component state #61748
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Remove the check for `cacheBootResources` from Auto render mode detection #61666
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, * NO MERGE *, 10.0-preview5
  • Blazor - rendering metrics and tracing #61609
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview5
  • Try register LazyAssemblyLoader to DI in AddInteractiveWebAssemblyCom… #61719
    area-blazor
  • Add reflection-based support for wrapping JS interop calls as C# delegates #61673
    area-blazor
  • Follow-up: Improve stopping renderer, fix identity template #61633
    area-blazor, feature-prerendering, feature-blazor-navigation, .NET 10 Planning
  • Associate tagged keys with entries so replacements are not evicted #61529
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 10.0-preview5

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FlowDirection not updating on iOS when switching languages in .NET MAUI Shell #29358
  • [perf] consider compiling AppThemeBindingExtension for NET9 #29356
  • [testing] UITEsts pipeline doesn t respect UseProvisionator #29355
    Backlog
  • [.NET10] CLI - Running Windows publish command would result in an error. #29350
  • [.NET10]The details page of any recipe in the "WhatToEat" sample project cannot be clicked #29349
  • [.NET10] CLI - MAUI Sample App failed to deploy on Windows with error: "The command xxx exited with code -1073741189." #29347
  • [iOS] App crashes when navigating to a page containing a map more than once #29346
  • Unable to determine if a Map Pin on the Map component has become invisible or not rendered due to its physical proximity to another pin at a given zoom level #29342

Closed

  • I1_Vertical_list_for_Multiple_Rows - Rotating the emulator would cause text to overflow. #29287
  • [Android][Label] Setting a Label visible after having had focus on a InputView will increase the Label's height #29194
    .NET 9 SR7
  • MAUI: coping a file to a dir on a IOS simulator #29348

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "[Android][NET 10] Fix: Ensure Image consumes touches properly #29363
    community ✨
  • Run Categories Separately #29362
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 10 #29360
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [main] Add the ability to intercept web requests #29359
  • [iOS] Fix for FlyoutItemImageStyle breaks selection of first item on startup. #29345
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-flyout, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix fo setting an Entry's Keyboard to Date causes it to be interpreted as a password input #29344
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for [Windows] HorizontalScrollBarVisibility="Never" not working in CarouselView on Windows platform #29343
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [Android] Fixed Setting a Label visible after having had focus on a InputView will increase the Label's height #29210
    p/0, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr6] [Android] Fixed Setting a Label visible after having had focus on a InputView will increase the Label's height #29357
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 29335 - [2025/05/12] Candidate #29352
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Updated

  • Add the ability to intercept all web resource requests #28876
    area-controls-webview, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [NET10] Replace the obsolete RunJavaScriptTextInputPanel #28531
    proposal/open, area-blazor, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Android Libraries Ecosystem Updates 20250502 #29331
  • [.NET 10] Add "Open/Close" API to picker controls #29323
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-datetimepicker, area-controls-picker
  • [tests] Add coreclr test for SF sample #29327
    area-testing
  • [Android] Button with corner radius shadow broken on Android device - fix #29339
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [ci] try do full build on dnceng #27456
    area-infrastructure
  • [Windows] Fix for Assigning null to the SelectedItem of the CollectionView in the SelectionChanged event does not clear the selection #29288
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix -[iOS] - CarouselView Throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException Immediately on Application Launch in CV2 #29316
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] - Fix Inconsistent Footer Scrolling Behaviour in CollectionView with EmptyView #28107
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android & iOS]Fix: GestureRecognizer Prevents Focus & User Interaction on Input Controls #28124
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • Fix ImageButton not rendering correctly based on its bounds #28309
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for RadioButton BorderColor and BorderWidth not updated at runtime #28335
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion
  • [MacOS] Fixed NullReferenceException when using ImagePaint #28726
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-image, partner/syncfusion
  • [2025/05/12] Candidate - In Flight Branch #29335
  • Changes in provisioning to fix fails installing Appium on Linux #29105
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Android] Fixed incorrect tab content display in TabbedPage #27294
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Optimize JS escaping #27528
    community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView ItemsSource Feature #29322
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar Black Background Issue When Setting Transparent Background #29225
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselView proper bounce-back behavior when Loop=false #29318
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Update failing CarouselView2 tests to use CarouselView1 in sample #29315
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Fixed Label text cropping when a width request is specified on the label inside a VerticalStackLayout with specified with request #29166
    community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Implemented the Resize and Downsize functions in the W2DImage class #29138
    platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed the color not being applied to the Expand/Collapse Chevron icon #29140
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed issue where group Header/Footer template was set to all items when IsGrouped was true for an ObservableCollection #29144
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for ItemSpacing value being retained when re-entering CollectionView with ItemsLayout set to vertical or horizontal list after navigating back. #29190
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed TransformProperties issue when a wrapper view is present #29228
    area-animation, platform/android 🤖, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] - Fix Custom FlyoutIcon from Being Overridden to Default Color in Shell #27580
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • Make sure to use the override implementation of PopViewController on NavigationRenderer #29330
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fixed Shell flyout background image does not displayed #28977
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Recover the uitest-build task on Android cake #28452
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MSBuildWorkspace methods can't be called in the same method body as MSBuildLocator.RegisterInstance #78478
  • Fail to compile C# 14.0 extension with interface constraint using implicit additional type parameters #78472
  • New APIs for "User Defined Compound Assignment Operators" feature #78468
  • "Go to Definition (F12) with Source Link no longer works after updating to Visual Studio 2022 17.12" #78465
  • CodeFix provider crashes #78464
  • Allow limiting scope of code fix to staged files #78462

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10605.64 #78477
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10606.70 #78476
  • .NET Core 3.1 ambiguous call when extending an interface from a nuget package #78474
  • VS2022 Incorrectly Modifies Event Handler Return Type #78409
  • #! "shebang" directives have changed from disallowed to allowed in ordinary files in recent compilers #78301
    Next
  • new extension syntax crashes build with certain event syntax #78413
  • Correctness CI failing with roslyn-analyzers documentation errors #78414

PullRequests

Created

  • *** WIP: Remove now unused methods from IWorkspaceProjectContext #78479
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • *** WIP: Update SolutionState._lazyFilePathToRelatedDocumentIds if GetFirstRelatedDocumentId ends up needing to do a full solution search. #78475
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move to the platform's implementation of the BackgroundWorkIndicator service. #78473
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Sem update #78467
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Move SpecializedCollections to Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections namespace #78466
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Don't unnecessarily create a document when only the document state is needed #78463
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update AnalyzerConfig.cs s_propertyMatcherPattern regex key #78459
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Add syntax highlighting of ignored directives #78458
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Feature - Ignored Directives

Merged

  • More extension operators declaration work #78457
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Update to platform background work pattern to make porting to their impl easier #78469
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md and Update Compiler Test Plan.md for instance operators #78460
    Area-Compilers, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators, Next
  • Enable analyzer doc validation in correctness runs #78420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove default impl of BackgroundWorkIndicator #78470
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid buffering and dispatching all ProducerConsumer items in one go in recent copilot helper. #78454
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add copilot tests IVT to ExternalAccess.Copilot #78455
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not parse URIs during LSP serialization/deserialization #76691
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge 'main' into 'extensions' #78461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Merge main into features/dictionary-expressions #78443
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Change `++`/`--` predefined operator names for instance operators #78434
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators, Next
  • Add WorkItem trait discoverer #78438
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Disallow shebang in project-based programs #78411
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Ignored Directives, Next
  • Merge "User Defined Compound Assignment Operators" feature to 'main' #78400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators, Next

Updated

  • File based programs IDE support #78208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix razor redirect #78448
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: resolve some follow-up comments on signature conflicts and betterness #78442
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Make compiler detection more resilient #78402
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move tests to NetLatest #78453
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.12] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #77262
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add code for analzying copilot changes. #78353
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Collection arguments: binding for interface target types #78436
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • Ensure we log what the HTTP error message is if we get a failure #78418
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement PDG.WithProjectsRemoved #78428
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Selectively persist the commandline to temporary storage #78441
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: analyzer actions #78319
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Fix unexpected conditional state in nullable analysis of conditional access #78439
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Targeted perf changes to CommandLineParser #78446
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Dictionary expressions: extend support for key-value pairs to non-dictionary collections of `KeyValuePair<K, V>` #78274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Reduce allocations during SourceGeneration #78403
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support interpolated string handlers in extension blocks #78425
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Long Running Test: PostAsyncNonDuplex_ServerCompletesResponseBodyThenResetsStreamWithNoError_SuccessAndRequestBodyCancelled #115349
  • Options validation source generator doesn't consider constructing ValidationContext with an IServiceProvider #115347
    Future
  • Test System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.TimerTests.TestTimers failing with "setCounter: actual 12 expected 13" #115346
  • Configuration-binding source generator doesn't bind Dictionary<string, Enum?> #115343
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: SVE: Rename Store() to StoreAndZip() #115338
  • Math.Clamp ArgumentException uses SR.Argument_MinMaxValue differently than Random.Next() #115337
  • Arm64 SVE: Implement missing extract methods #115336
  • Arm64 SVE: Remaining SVE1 API work #115331
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 15 Regressions on 5/2/2025 11:56:41 PM +00:00 #115340
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Security.Principal.Windows, Version=4.1.1.0 #115326
  • Build Error: Build failure with Address Sanitizer when using clr+libs+packs.product #115324
  • Support precompiling fast type switches in ILC cctor interpreter (Native AOT) #115323
    Future
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V2.0-Beta2/b425314/b425314/b425314.cmd #115321
  • Test failure: profiler/elt/slowpatheltleave/slowpatheltleave.cmd #115319
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Reflection.Metadata.ApplyUpdateTest.TestGenericAddStaticField #115318
    10.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: CurrencyInfo #115322
  • [Linux] X509 chains with user principal name (UPN) name constraints fail to build #87413
    10.0.0
  • Empty LdapException.ServerErrorMessage on Linux #83259
    Future
  • When PublishAot=true, MsBuild's RuntimeHostConfigurationOption is not taken into account in output .runtimeconfig.json #115269
  • [API Proposal]: Add XChaCha20-Poly1305 #115329
  • ConfiguredCancelableAsyncEnumerable<T> to IAsyncEnumerable<T>? #115328
  • .NET 9 Blazor WebAssembly: Rendering exception due to recursive type definition #109931
    10.0.0
  • CommandLine & Json Config #36542
  • How to emulate Expression.This() when using CompileToMethod #28774
  • Deadlock in loader lock (CoreCLR) from background GC in XAML apps #114182
  • [mono-runtime] runtime build on mainline is taking very long time on s390x #114389
  • Math.FusedMultiplyAdd returns wrong results on systems without FMA3 support #98704
    Future
  • [mono] MONO_THREADS_SUSPEND preemptive hit asset #115185
  • Clean up stale debugger-related surface area in ThreadPool and Task{Scheduler} #62653
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix config source gen with Dictionary with nullable Enum value #115350
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 10.0.0
  • Vector128.WithElement codegen regression in .NET 9.0 #115348
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve startup perf by avoiding JIT when invoking well-known signatures #115345
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 10.0.0
  • [wasm][jiterp] Implement i8 jiterp shuffle and simplify logic #115344
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 10.0.0
  • Share allocation helpers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #115339
    NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Introduce Zbs #115335
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RuntimeAsync] ilasm/ildasm support for the MethodImpl.Async #115332
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution, runtime-async
  • [Android][Testing] Run runtime and libraries tests on all supported Android API versions #115330
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enhancing the SqlDbType with vector #115327
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Remove SLH-DSA OOM test #115341
    area-System.Security
  • Fix instance size emission in ILCompiler to handle indeterminate sizes #115293
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Use packedsimd in hexconverter #115062
  • Handle not supported name constraints on Linux #115308
    area-System.Security
  • Update MacOS signing to use PME #115342
    needs-area-label
  • Fix empty LdapException.ServerErrorMessage #115192
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] improve distribute_free_regions #115023
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.17
  • [release/9.0-staging] improve distribute_free_regions #115167
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.6
  • Onboard the GitHub Action based Issue-Labeler #115256
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Perf] Add build time measurements for apple mobile and android scenarios #113469
    tenet-build-performance, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline, 10.0.0
  • Align SlhDsa API with MLKem #115290
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #115257
    area-codeflow
  • [cDAC] Implement ISOSDacImpl.GetAssemblyList #114800
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][metadata] Defer class init for T when initializing T[]. #115278
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [clr-interp] Fix access of boxed static fields address #115198
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Make sure interpreter gc_transitions gets reset on managed exceptions. #115052
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix SLH-DSA key to use SHA-1 MAC for Windows support #115271
    area-System.Security
  • Clean up stale debugger-related surface area in ThreadPool and Task{Scheduler} #115210
    area-System.Threading.Tasks

Updated

  • Implementation for `UnsafeAccessorTypeAttribute` #114881
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Create a single copy of stub templates #114462
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable revocation list tests for ML-DSA and SLH-DSA #115254
    area-System.Security
  • Make the dotnet/runtime official build an assetless build #115311
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2703393 #115228
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Replace use of DAMT.All in ComponentModel with a more restricted set #114126
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation
  • ML-DSA+COSE #115158
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Improve Math.BigMul to fix Decimal compare perf regression #115182
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Implement IXCLRDataProcess.EnumMethodInstancesByAddress #115131
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Haiku: Add native library network support #114523
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, os-haiku, 10.0.0
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    tenet-performance, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Write barrier without any RWX pages #114982
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Revert change to follow symlinks of dotnet host #115315
    area-Host
  • [WIP][Linux][EventPipe][UserEvents] Add user events eventpipe support #115265
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add APIs to `BlobBuilder` for customizing the underlying byte array et al. #115294
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Android] Support static linking of CoreCLR on Android #114629
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • Fix Metadata aggregator: removing cumulative sum for GUIDs heap offset #115268
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add wa-info tool to src/mono/wasm/tools #110565
    NO-SQUASH, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Consider instruction input size when considering embedded mask optimization #115074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Interpreter GC info stage 3: Report locals to the GC #114469
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • EH support in the interpreter #115252
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Remove always searching executable directory for native libraries in single-file applications #115236
    breaking-change, area-Single-File, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 10.0.0
  • [mono][aot] optimize aot Unsafe.BitCast for more cases #115130
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Tensor<T> select. Iteration along dimensions #113697
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser] runtimeConfig via boot config #115113
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use AssemblyLoadContext-aware caches in TypeDescriptor to support unloading of assemblies cached by TypeDescriptor #114619
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • arm64: Optimise GT/GE/LT/LE comparisons in return statements #112863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono]: Fix generic interface non-virtual method vt_slot issue in build_imt_slots. #115306
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Android] Run CoreCLR library tests on Android #114148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • Smaller funclet prologs/epilogs (x64) #115284
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-06
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add a codegen switch for LLVM IR verification #3107
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Wasm managed threads - build new nupkg #3060
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GenAPI event declaration pattern is too verbose #48831
  • GenAPI doesn't always add a blank line between types #48830
  • .NET Template Engine: Post-Action Fails with Missing 'executable' Argument #48829
  • Virtual projects should use a `/path/to/file.cs.csproj` naming convention #48828

Closed

  • Can't scaffold Razor View by local Regional format #23170
  • `dotnet run` cannot run the project due to `System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: startIndex cannot be larger than length of string. (Parameter 'startIndex')` exception #23148
  • New CopyLocal item metadata doesn't seem to work on ProjectReferences #23146
  • After install 6.0 GA arm64 SDK on Mac OS Monterey(12.0.1) Parallels VM on M1 machine, use ` dotnet --info ` met error "Unhandled exception." #22978
  • I can't create a project with dotnet cli #22846
  • building the branch "release/6.0.2xx" of the installer failed on amd64-linux-debian10 #22844
  • WinForms app which targeting .NET Core 3.1 is build failed on only have .NET 5.0.404-serving.21572.11 installed machine #22842
  • Templating workflows broken for paths with special characters on MacOS since SDK 9.0.200 #48794
  • Commit hashes inside the productCommit.txt doesn't match any repository #48801

PullRequests

Created

  • Add default for dotnet reference list Fixes #48555 #48825
  • Update README to point SDK installer link to dotnet/dotnet repository #48821

Merged

  • Add RoslynCompilerType Vbc tests #48798
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fixup sln #48812
  • Replace P3 with P4 and remove Windows ARM & RHEL 6 rows #48824
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #48822
    Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Fix the path check to ensure it correctly handles casing and character codes #45883
    untriaged
  • Fix Microsoft.IO.Redist versions #48819
    Area-CodeFlow
  • sln-add: --include-references when adding a project #48815
    Area-CLI
  • update template descriptions to be more beginner-friendly #48609
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Enable 'partial' AOT of the CLI #48790
    Area-CLI
  • Add trailing slash for -o Fixes #45682 #48640
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Ignore .slnx #48729
    Servicing-approved, Branch Lockdown, 9.0.6
  • Ensure file-based program artifacts are restricted to the current user #48813
    Area-run-file
  • Enable container test execution #48763
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support multiple files in file-based programs #48782
    Area-run-file
  • Add file-based program API for use by IDE #48749
    Area-run-file
